chat.common

Class Interceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • chat.common.Interceptor

  • public final class Interceptor
extends Object
    This class contains the interception of the calls to the actions to receive messages in the client. The behaviour is controlled by the boolean constant Action.INTERCEPTION_ON. When set, the default method Action.executeOrIntercept(AbstractState, AbstractContent) redirects the receipt of the message to the method intercept(AbstractState, AbstractContent).
    Author:
    Denis Conan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static void intercept(AbstractState state, AbstractContent msg)
      intercepts the receipt of a message.

    • Method Detail

      • intercept

        public static void intercept(AbstractState state,
                             AbstractContent msg)
        intercepts the receipt of a message. This is where is introduced some non-determinism for integration testing of the distributed algorithms. This method is called by the default method Action.executeOrIntercept(AbstractState, AbstractContent) when the interception mechanism is activated, that is Action.INTERCEPTION_ON is true. TODO this is where to program for instance non-FIFO communication, message loss, etc.
        Parameters:
        state - the state of the receiver.
        msg - the message to schedule.
